data.script:
<script>
    import {
        Button,
        Card,
        Overlay,
    } from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Button is="label" for="overlay-lazy">
    Open LAZY Overlay
</Button>

<Overlay.Container
    logic_id="overlay-lazy"
    loading="lazy"
>
    <Overlay.Section>
        <Card.Container
            palette="inverse"
            max_width="75"
        >
            <Card.Header>LAZY Overlay</Card.Header>

            <Card.Footer>
                <Overlay.Button
                    palette="auto"
                    variation="clear"
                >
                    Dismiss
                </Overlay.Button>
            </Card.Footer>
        </Card.Container>
    </Overlay.Section>
</Overlay.Container>
data.title: Overlay Loading
